Summary
Hi , Thanks for visiting my profile! 
I work as a Data Scientist at Vodafone, Germany.  And I hold
a Master's degree in Computer Science from the University of
Stuttgart, Germany. Prior to my Master's degree, I worked as a
Software Engineer at JP Morgan Chase & Co.
